{"id":462296786,"lang":"java","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1614638384,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/462296786/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean validPalindrome(String s) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length() / 2; i++) {\n            if (s.charAt(i) != s.charAt(s.length() - 1 - i)) {\n                int j = s.length() - i - 1;\n                return (isPalindromeRange(s, i + 1, j) ||\n                       isPalindromeRange(s, i, j - 1));\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    private boolean isPalindromeRange(String s, int i, int j) {\n        for (int k = i; k <= i + (j - i) / 2; k++) {\n            if (s.charAt(k) != s.charAt(j - k + i)) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
